com.marshalchen.common.ui.FloatingActionButtonWithListView

类 ScrollDirectionDetector

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.marshalchen.common.ui.FloatingActionButtonWithListView.ScrollDirectionDetector
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    android.widget.AbsListView.OnScrollListener
    直接已知子类:
    FloatingActionButton.FabOnScrollListener

    public abstract class ScrollDirectionDetector
extends java.lang.Object
implements android.widget.AbsListView.OnScrollListener
    Detects which direction list view was scrolled.

    Set ScrollDirectionListener to get callbacks ScrollDirectionListener.onScrollDown() or ScrollDirectionListener.onScrollUp()

    从以下版本开始:
    2014-10-09 01:20
